mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "acdate", a.request_no AS "tradeNo", a.type AS "biztype", a.remarks AS "remark", a.amount AS "amount", a.commission AS "commission", a.guarant_amt AS "guarantAmt"
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ,b.userId AS "userId", b.transactionAmt AS debit, 0.00 AS credit FROM t_fd_payment a,t_fd_account_log b WHERE a.request_no = b.relateRequestNo AND a.type IN('8','10') AND a.`status`='S' UNION ALL SELECT ,a.user_id AS "userId", 0.00 AS debit,a.amount AS credit FROM t_fd_payment a WHERE a.type ='9' AND a.`status`='S' ) aa WHERE aa.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ,b.userId AS "userId", b.transactionAmt AS debit, 0.00 AS credit FROM t_fd_payment a,t_fd_account_log b WHERE a.request_no = b.relateRequestNo AND a.type IN('8','10') AND a.`status`='S' UNION ALL SELECT ,a.user_id AS "userId", 0.00 AS debit,a.amount AS credit FROM t_fd_payment a WHERE a.type ='9' AND a.`status`='S' ) aa WHERE aa.userId IN('SYS_GENERATE_001','SYS_GENERATE_002','SYS_GENERATE_003','SYS_GENERATE_004')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
